meanings.definition: The leader of a group, especially one involved in illegal activities.
meanings.sent1: The ringleader of the gang organized the robbery.
meanings.sent2: The students chose a ringleader to lead their project group.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ringleader convinced his friends to skip school.
meanings.sent4: The ringleader of the pack always knew how to get what he wanted.
meanings.sent5: The cunning ringleader plotted the escape with precision.

meanings.definition: A person who leads or initiates a group or activity.
meanings.sent1: The ringleader of the dance group choreographed a stunning routine.
meanings.sent2: The team's ringleader motivated everyone to give their best effort.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous ringleader suggested a spontaneous road trip.
meanings.sent4: The ringleader of the book club always picks interesting reads.
meanings.sent5: The charismatic ringleader inspired others to follow their dreams.
